name: Burhani web solutions
tag_list: web-designing, web-development, software, ecommerce-website, web-application, internet-marketing, web-promotion
overview:
We provide solutions for every kind of website including simple websites useful for small business , also e-commerce website where business/person can sell products and services , we also design personal websites like portfolio or a virtual card online

We are a small business with innovative ideas and the capability to work hard with full efforts and using latest tools and technology. We provide full support to our customers and always ready to solve their queries anytime

we also specialize in making CMS ( content management system ) for providing dynamic web interface , it is useful for a business and its employees , the business can run its own application over the internet on their website
